item.description:
Showtime is at 7 (Real 3D version), I will be at the theater by 6.  We will go in for seats at 6:30.  

The movie is showing upstairs, so I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator.   If you get there before me, please grab a table. 

This looks like a fun action movie....explosions, special effects, bad one liners....it's got it all.  :)

It is opening night for this movie, so you should strongly consider buying your ticket in advance.

In general, I will get to the theater an hour before the movie starts and the group will head in for seats about 30 minutes before hand.

If you miss the group before the movie.  We will gather outside the room that the movie is shown in to discuss the movie a bit, allow for restroom breaks and get a head count of all those who would like to go out for drinks/dinner after.    Remember to bring cash if you plan on attending the after event.  Too many cards causes confusion for the group and the restaurant.

Movie Details:

Release Date: July 22, 2011 (3D/2D theaters)
Studio: Paramount Pictures, Marvel Studios
Director: Joe Johnston
Screenwriter:Christopher Markus, Stephen McFeely
Starring:Chris Evans, Tommy Lee Jones, Hugo Weaving, Hayley Atwell, Sebastian Stan, Dominic Cooper, Toby Jones, Neal McDonough, Derek Luke, Stanley Tucci
Genre: Action, Adventure
MPAA Rating:PG-13 (for intense sequences of sci-fi violence and action)
Official Website: CaptainAmerica.com
Plot Summary: " Captain America : The First Avenger" will focus on the early days of the Marvel Universe when Steve Rogers (Chris Evans) volunteers to participate in an experimental program that turns him into the Super Soldier known as Captain America. As Captain America, Rogers joins forces with Bucky Barnes (Sebastian Stan) and Peggy Carter (Hayley Atwell) to wage war on the evil HYDRA organization, led by the villainous Red Skull (Hugo Weaving.)
item.how_to_find_us: If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If it is showing downstairs, I will be waiting near the ropes by the concession stand until they let us in.
item.name: Captain America: The First Avenger
